system.description: You have perfected the use of your Maglev Coils, allowing you to hover effortlessly and move with preternatural grace while airborne.
system.benefit: Character can hover for 1d10+2×Toughness Bonus Minutes. While their Maglev Coils are active, they can move at Run Speed as a Half Action and suffer no damage from falling. Each use drains half the power stored in the coils (typically meaning they can be used twice before requiring recharge).

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Hover
specialAbilities.description: Hover for 1d10+2×TB minutes. While hovering, move at Run Speed as a Half Action and take no fall damage. Each use drains 50% of coil power (typically 2 uses before recharge).
